#This file is autogenerated! Don't modify it directly!!!
dutch_greenland_area_scripted_country_name = { #Groenland, historical
    	# regular old country trigger
    	country_trigger = {
            #TODO this isn't quite working yet - it might crash the game during start depending on your last save...?
            #NOT = {
    		#	any_primary_or_accepted_culture = { is_culture_native_american = yes }
    		#}
    		OR = {
    			
					court_language = dialect:dutch_dialect
					culture.dialect = dialect:dutch_dialect
					overlord ?= {
						court_language = dialect:dutch_dialect
					}
					overlord ?= {
						culture.dialect = dialect:dutch_dialect
					}
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check country's capital against, has to pass
    	capital_trigger = {
    		OR = {
    			area = area:greenland_area
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check all the country locations against, all have to pass
    	location_trigger = {
    	}
    }

dutch_massachusetts_area_scripted_country_name = { #Almouchicosen, Historical: derived from the French term 'Almouchiquois' coined by Samuel de Champlain 1613, referencing the Algonquian. Appears on all Dutch maps since then as 'Almouchicoesen' or '-cosen'.
    	# regular old country trigger
    	country_trigger = {
            #TODO this isn't quite working yet - it might crash the game during start depending on your last save...?
            #NOT = {
    		#	any_primary_or_accepted_culture = { is_culture_native_american = yes }
    		#}
    		OR = {
    			
					court_language = dialect:dutch_dialect
					culture.dialect = dialect:dutch_dialect
					overlord ?= {
						court_language = dialect:dutch_dialect
					}
					overlord ?= {
						culture.dialect = dialect:dutch_dialect
					}
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check country's capital against, has to pass
    	capital_trigger = {
    		OR = {
    			area = area:massachusetts_area
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check all the country locations against, all have to pass
    	location_trigger = {
    	}
    }
dutch_southern_new_england_area_scripted_country_name = { #Rodenbergh, Historical: navigator Adriaen Block named the area near modern day Newhaven 'Rodenbergh' in 1614. The harbour built there later was later also named Rodenbergh, until the English changed its name to Newhaven.
    	# regular old country trigger
    	country_trigger = {
            #TODO this isn't quite working yet - it might crash the game during start depending on your last save...?
            #NOT = {
    		#	any_primary_or_accepted_culture = { is_culture_native_american = yes }
    		#}
    		OR = {
    			
					court_language = dialect:dutch_dialect
					culture.dialect = dialect:dutch_dialect
					overlord ?= {
						court_language = dialect:dutch_dialect
					}
					overlord ?= {
						culture.dialect = dialect:dutch_dialect
					}
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check country's capital against, has to pass
    	capital_trigger = {
    		OR = {
    			area = area:southern_new_england_area
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check all the country locations against, all have to pass
    	location_trigger = {
    	}
    }
dutch_vermont_area_scripted_country_name = { #Missiskwia, Semi-Historical: Originally named after the Iroquois. While not the heartland of the Iroquois, the Dutch back then didn't really care. With actual contact when colonizing, the Dutch would name the region after the local Mazipskoiak/Missiquoi
    	# regular old country trigger
    	country_trigger = {
            #TODO this isn't quite working yet - it might crash the game during start depending on your last save...?
            #NOT = {
    		#	any_primary_or_accepted_culture = { is_culture_native_american = yes }
    		#}
    		OR = {
    			
					court_language = dialect:dutch_dialect
					culture.dialect = dialect:dutch_dialect
					overlord ?= {
						court_language = dialect:dutch_dialect
					}
					overlord ?= {
						culture.dialect = dialect:dutch_dialect
					}
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check country's capital against, has to pass
    	capital_trigger = {
    		OR = {
    			area = area:vermont_area
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check all the country locations against, all have to pass
    	location_trigger = {
    	}
    }

    	# regular old country trigger
    	country_trigger = {
            #TODO this isn't quite working yet - it might crash the game during start depending on your last save...?
            #NOT = {
    		#	any_primary_or_accepted_culture = { is_culture_native_american = yes }
    		#}
    		OR = {
    			
					court_language = dialect:dutch_dialect
					culture.dialect = dialect:dutch_dialect
					overlord ?= {
						court_language = dialect:dutch_dialect
					}
					overlord ?= {
						culture.dialect = dialect:dutch_dialect
					}
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check country's capital against, has to pass
    	capital_trigger = {
    		OR = {
    			area = area:new_hampshire_area
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check all the country locations against, all have to pass
    	location_trigger = {
    	}
    }
dutch_maine_area_scripted_country_name = { #Norumbega, Historical: on old maps the territory was named as 'Norumbega pars', named after the mythical city of Norumbega. 
    	# regular old country trigger
    	country_trigger = {
            #TODO this isn't quite working yet - it might crash the game during start depending on your last save...?
            #NOT = {
    		#	any_primary_or_accepted_culture = { is_culture_native_american = yes }
    		#}
    		OR = {
    			
					court_language = dialect:dutch_dialect
					culture.dialect = dialect:dutch_dialect
					overlord ?= {
						court_language = dialect:dutch_dialect
					}
					overlord ?= {
						culture.dialect = dialect:dutch_dialect
					}
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check country's capital against, has to pass
    	capital_trigger = {
    		OR = {
    			area = area:maine_area
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check all the country locations against, all have to pass
    	location_trigger = {
    	}
    }
dutch_hudson_area_scripted_country_name = { #Mauritia, Historical: the The Hudson river was named during Dutch rule as 'Mauritius' after Maurits of Orange, stadthouder of Holland and Zealand. Since the chance that the Dutch tag would have had a Maurits as a (former) ruler, this name is up for debate. Namesake of the island in the Indian Ocean also named after the same person. Alternatively, this region would be called Nieuw Amsterdam, named after the largest settlement.
    	# regular old country trigger
    	country_trigger = {
            #TODO this isn't quite working yet - it might crash the game during start depending on your last save...?
            #NOT = {
    		#	any_primary_or_accepted_culture = { is_culture_native_american = yes }
    		#}
    		OR = {
    			
					court_language = dialect:dutch_dialect
					culture.dialect = dialect:dutch_dialect
					overlord ?= {
						court_language = dialect:dutch_dialect
					}
					overlord ?= {
						culture.dialect = dialect:dutch_dialect
					}
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check country's capital against, has to pass
    	capital_trigger = {
    		OR = {
    			area = area:hudson_area
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check all the country locations against, all have to pass
    	location_trigger = {
    	}
    }
dutch_haudenosaunee_area_scripted_country_name = { #Irocoisia, Semi-Historical: originally, Vermont was erroneously named Irocoisia. To make ethnographically more accurate, it should encompass Haudenosaunee. After all Blaeu never visited the region, people settling it would.
    	# regular old country trigger
    	country_trigger = {
            #TODO this isn't quite working yet - it might crash the game during start depending on your last save...?
            #NOT = {
    		#	any_primary_or_accepted_culture = { is_culture_native_american = yes }
    		#}
    		OR = {
    			
					court_language = dialect:dutch_dialect
					culture.dialect = dialect:dutch_dialect
					overlord ?= {
						court_language = dialect:dutch_dialect
					}
					overlord ?= {
						culture.dialect = dialect:dutch_dialect
					}
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check country's capital against, has to pass
    	capital_trigger = {
    		OR = {
    			area = area:haudenosaunee_area
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check all the country locations against, all have to pass
    	location_trigger = {
    	}
    }
dutch_new_jersey_area_scripted_country_name = { #Pavonia, Historical: There were only few notable Dutch settlement, one of them being Pavonia, now Hoboken/Jersey City. It was named after Michiel Reyniersz Pauw, a local plantation owner. Pavonia being the latinized version of his surname 'Pauw'.
    	# regular old country trigger
    	country_trigger = {
            #TODO this isn't quite working yet - it might crash the game during start depending on your last save...?
            #NOT = {
    		#	any_primary_or_accepted_culture = { is_culture_native_american = yes }
    		#}
    		OR = {
    			
					court_language = dialect:dutch_dialect
					culture.dialect = dialect:dutch_dialect
					overlord ?= {
						court_language = dialect:dutch_dialect
					}
					overlord ?= {
						culture.dialect = dialect:dutch_dialect
					}
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check country's capital against, has to pass
    	capital_trigger = {
    		OR = {
    			area = area:new_jersey_area
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check all the country locations against, all have to pass
    	location_trigger = {
    	}
    }

    		OR = {
    			area = area:louisiana_area
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check all the country locations against, all have to pass
    	location_trigger = {
    	}
    }
dutch_arkansas_area_scripted_country_name = { #Akansalandt, After local Akansa
    	# regular old country trigger
    	country_trigger = {
            #TODO this isn't quite working yet - it might crash the game during start depending on your last save...?
            #NOT = {
    		#	any_primary_or_accepted_culture = { is_culture_native_american = yes }
    		#}
    		OR = {
    			
					court_language = dialect:dutch_dialect
					culture.dialect = dialect:dutch_dialect
					overlord ?= {
						court_language = dialect:dutch_dialect
					}
					overlord ?= {
						culture.dialect = dialect:dutch_dialect
					}
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check country's capital against, has to pass
    	capital_trigger = {
    		OR = {
    			area = area:arkansas_area
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check all the country locations against, all have to pass
    	location_trigger = {
    	}
    }

						court_language = dialect:dutch_dialect

dutch_minnesota_area_scripted_country_name = { #Kiliaenia, After Kiliaen van Rensselaer. By the time anyone settled this, Kiliaen should be seen as one of the most influential figures in early Dutch overseas expansion.

            #TODO this isn't quite working yet - it might crash the game during start depending on your last save...?

    		#}

					culture.dialect = dialect:dutch_dialect

						court_language = dialect:dutch_dialect
					}

    	# trigger to check country's capital against, has to pass
    	capital_trigger = {
    		OR = {
    			area = area:south_island_area
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check all the country locations against, all have to pass
    	location_trigger = {
    	}
    }
dutch_north_island_area_scripted_country_name = { #Statenlandt
    	# regular old country trigger
    	country_trigger = {
            #TODO this isn't quite working yet - it might crash the game during start depending on your last save...?
            #NOT = {
    		#	any_primary_or_accepted_culture = { is_culture_native_american = yes }
    		#}
    		OR = {
    			
					court_language = dialect:dutch_dialect
					culture.dialect = dialect:dutch_dialect
					overlord ?= {
						court_language = dialect:dutch_dialect
					}
					overlord ?= {
						culture.dialect = dialect:dutch_dialect
					}
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check country's capital against, has to pass
    	capital_trigger = {
    		OR = {
    			area = area:north_island_area
    		}
    	}
    	
    	# trigger to check all the country locations against, all have to pass
    	location_trigger = {
    	}
    }
